languages.text: {n}Толпа затихает, пожирая вас обожающими взглядами. Лица многих перечеркивают жуткие шрамы, полученные в недавней битве за Даргонус. Словно дети, они ждут свое{mf|го|й} велико{mf|го отца|й матери}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Толпа затихает, пожирая вас обожающими взглядами. Лица многих перечеркивают жуткие шрамы, полученные в недавней битве за Даргонус. Словно дети, они ждут отца свое{mf|го|й}{/n} велико{mf|го отца|й матери}".

languages.text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа затихает, пожирая вас обожающими взглядами. Лица многих перечеркивают жуткие шрамы, полученные в недавней битве за Даргонус. Словно дети, они ждут свое{mf|го|й} велико{mf|го отца|й матери}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd falls quiet, the people are staring at you with adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

{n}The crowd falls quiet, the people are staring at you with adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

{n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

{n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

{n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆が静けさに包まれると、熱をもった視線があなたに注がれる。最近起きたダルゴナスの戦いで傷を負った者が多く、全能の{mf|父|母}の言葉を子供のように待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆が静けさに包まれると、熱をもった視線があなたに注がれる。最近起きたダルゴナスの戦いで傷を負った者が多く、全能の{mf|父|母}の言葉を子供のように待っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群渐渐安静下来，纷纷以崇拜的目光仰望着你。达戈努斯最近发生的那场战斗，给他们之中许多人留下了难以愈合的伤痛。他们像崇拜{mf|父亲|母亲}的孩子一样，满怀敬仰地等待着你的发言。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群渐渐安静下来，纷纷以崇拜的目光仰望着你。达戈努斯最近发生的那场战斗，给他们之中许多人留下了难以愈合的伤痛。他们像崇拜{mf|父亲|母亲}的孩子一样，满怀敬仰地等待着你的发言。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cae el silencio sobre la muchedumbre, que te mira con adoración. Muchos tienen cicatrices espantosas de la reciente batalla de Dargonus. Como niños, esperan las palabras de su todopoderos{mf|o|a} {mf|p|m}adre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cae el silencio sobre la muchedumbre, que te mira con adoración. Muchos tienen cicatrices espantosas de la reciente batalla de Dargonus. Como niños, esperan las palabras de su todopoderos{mf|o|a} {mf|p|m}adre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les spectateurs, subitement silencieux, lèvent vers vous des yeux pleins d'adoration. Bon nombre d'entre eux arborent des cicatrices récoltées lors des récents combats sur Dargonus. Comme des enfants, ils attendent fiévreusement que leur {mf|père|mère} prenne la parole.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les spectateurs, subitement silencieux, lèvent vers vous des yeux pleins d'adoration. Bon nombre d'entre eux arborent des cicatrices récoltées lors des récents combats sur Dargonus. Comme des enfants, ils attendent fiévreusement que leur {mf|père|mère} prenne la parole.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menge verstummt und blickt bewundernd zu dir auf. Viele haben von der Schlacht um Dargonus schreckliche Narben davongetragen. Wie Kinder erwarten sie nun die Worte {mf|ihres allmächtigen Vaters|ihrer allmächtigen Mutter}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge verstummt und blickt bewundernd zu dir auf. Viele haben von der Schlacht um Dargonus schreckliche Narben davongetragen. Wie Kinder erwarten sie nun die Worte {mf|ihres allmächtigen Vaters|ihrer allmächtigen Mutter}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sana hayranlıkla bakan kalabalığın üzerine sessizlik çöküyor. Birçoğu, son Dargonus muharebesinden kalma korkunç yaralar taşıyor. Çocuklar gibi, yüce {mf|babalarının|analarının} diyeceklerini bekliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hush falls over the crowd, who gaze upon you in adoration. Many of them bear terrible scars from the recent battle of Dargonus. Like children, they await the word of their almighty {mf|father|mother}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana hayranlıkla bakan kalabalığın üzerine sessizlik çöküyor. Birçoğu, son Dargonus muharebesinden kalma korkunç yaralar taşıyor. Çocuklar gibi, yüce {mf|babalarının|analarının} sözünü bekliyorlar.{/n}
